source_objects.description: Achieve your entrepreneurship dreams with courses on: lean start-up, developing a business plan, and launching your venture.
source_objects.title: Entrepreneurship

items.title: Start a Fitness Personal Trainer Business - Plan & Documents
items.headline: Course provides full business plan template and operating documents for starting a Fitness / Personal training business
objectives_summary: You will have a full business plan, financial model, Trainer Evaluation Sheet (to do an initial evaluation of clients) and a Training Program Sheet (to provide clients with a routine) for starting a Fitness / Personal Training Business

items.title: Why haven't YOU started YOUR business yet?
items.headline: Lets overcome some excuses
objectives_summary: Why you and many others have not started a business yet
We explore what holds people back from pursuing their goals
We will cover some ideas how you can overcome these obstacles

items.title: Event Planning made simple from Home
items.headline: Learn how to start and grow your own event planning business from scratch.
objectives_summary: Start an Event Planning Business/Service from home
Advertise to potentual customers for free or at a low price
Create the contracts needed to start your Event Planning Business

items.title: How I built my success as a video producer & how you can too
items.headline: Learn the secrets to your success in the film & video production industry. Proven strategy.
objectives_summary: Learn how to set up a business, undertake marketing initiatives and achieve success in your chosen creative field.
My fail safe budget management system to ensure you're still making money.
Advice on how to avoid the mistakes I made and get to your success sooner.

items.title: How I Built An Online Business (with 6 Sources)
items.headline: Learn exactly how I built my own online business with six different sources! Everything is included.
objectives_summary: Know what to do first when starting your own online business
Understand the positives and negatives of selling digital products versus physical products
Set realistic expectations for making money online

items.title: Become an Odoo Consultant & start selling Odoo to Businesses
items.headline: Learn Odoo Consulting for beginners
objectives_summary: Learn how to offer Odoo ERP Solutions to local businesses.
Understand why this is the right time to start your own Odoo consulting.
You will  have all skills to be efficient in selling Odoo solutions.
